title: Strobelight: Meta's eBPF Profiler Framework for Massive Infra
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: With eBPF, Meta's Strobelight profiler has monitored everything from the tiniest factors to the entire hypercloud.
cntitle: Strobelight：Meta 用于大规模基础设施的 eBPF 分析器框架
cndescription: 借助 eBPF，Meta 的 Strobelight 性能分析器已经监控了从最微小的因素到整个超云的一切。
